name: "You are a star!" STERLING SILVER STAR PENDANT
description:
Sterling Silver Star Pendant on Sterling Silver Chain

Design is handmade and designed by Hilary Ottens, aka Hilary&June, in her Bondi Beach studio in Australia.

You can wear this pendant necklace with anything . . . jeans, a dress or to work.

Dimensions:

Star Pendant: 925 (sterling silver)

Thickness: 1mm
Width: 7/8th of an inch/2.5cm
Height:1 inch/2.8cm

Snake Chain: 925 (sterling silver)

45cm/18 inches

The original design takes a day to make. I use a sheet of sterling silver and a tiny little piercing saw to make the shape. I then file, sand and polish the piece to perfection! I then get a wax mold made out of the original design and then cast from the wax mold. All my designs are made in this manner.

I take custom requests as well as orders for stores, corporate functions etc.

Please feel to contact me anytime for a chat or a request.

name: Guitar Pic Pendant - men and women
description:
Sterling Silver Guitar Pendant on Leather

Design is handmade and designed by Hilary Ottens, aka Hilary&June, in her Bondi Beach studio in Australia.

Anyone can wear this pendant, men or women, espeically to a gig, concert or in studio time!

Dimensions:
Guitar Pic Pendant: 925 (sterling silver)

Thickness: 1mm
Width: 1 inch
Height:1 inch

Leather:

5mm thick
23.6 inches/60cm

Comes in a gift box.

The original design takes a day to make. I use a sheet of sterling silver and a tiny little piercing saw to make the shape. I then file, sand and polish the piece to perfection! I then get a wax mold made out of the original design and then cast from the wax mold. All my designs are made in this manner.

I take custom requests as well as orders for stores, corporate functions etc.

I have more designs available upon request.

Please feel to contact me anytime for a chat or a custom order.
